params.receiver: The address of the receiver of shares

returns.limit: The maximum amount of shares that can be minted to the receiver

params.max_loss: The maximum loss that can be incurred
params.owner: The address of the owner of the shares
params.strategies: The strategies that can be used to mitigate the loss

returns.limit: The maximum amount of shares that can be withdrawn

available_deposit_limit(address).notice: Limit depositor to only one address

available_withdraw_limit(address,uint256.notice: Limit withdrawals to only one address
